name: K. Jyotiraditya Singh
college: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad

social_work: Final Year Coordinator at Anokhi Pehel: Served as the Final Year Coordinator at Anokhi Pehel, a non-profit organization initiated by students with a shared mission to support underprivileged students through various initiatives and events.
Member of NSS (National Service Scheme): A public service program conducted by the Ministry of Youth Affairs.

education.school: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad

projects.name: EAT EASY
projects.description: Implemented role-based login/signup using organization IDs, with features like OTP email verification, password recovery, and user profile updates. Developed complaint management portal for complaint registration, viewing, filtering, commenting, and voting, with resolution by authorized roles. Enabled accountants to add, edit, delete, and filter daily expenses, track spending on specific items within date ranges, and perform detailed expense analysis using charts. Introduced separate meal rating features for breakfast, lunch, supper, and dinner, along with a calorie intake display based on user food input, and temporary user blocking functionality.

projects.name: CHAT MATE
projects.description: Enacted a login and signup system utilizing organization IDs. The system includes features such as OTP email verification and password recovery. Developed a real-time messaging system where users can engage in one-to-one and group chats instantly, enhancing communication efficiency and user engagement. Integrated a search feature allowing users to find others for direct messaging, complemented by real-time notifications to alert users of new messages even when the chat window is not active. Enabled users to initiate both one-to-one and group video calls, enhancing communication capabilities with face-to-face interaction for improved user experience and collaboration.

full_output.name: K. Jyotiraditya Singh
achievements_and_awards: Secured 2nd Runner-Up position in Webster 2k23 at CodeSangam, MNNIT.
Global Rank 6 in CodeChef Starters 128 Division 3 (Rated), held on 3rd April 2024.
Rank-13 in CODE OF THE DAY among 750 students from 2nd and 3rd yr by solving 7/7 newly released algorithmic problems over a period of 7 days in Avishkar, MNNITs TechFest.
Rank-5 in INSOMNIA Qualifiers (annual programming event) in Avishkar, MNNITs TechFest.
Got 4th place in Chem-E-Cross 2k24 event of IIT Bombays Fest named as Azeotropy.
First runner up in Pump It 2k22 (Avishkar , MNNIT)
